Class Counter

java.lang.Object

      org.apache.avalon.cornerstone.threads.tutorial.Counter
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogEnabled, Runnable
public class Counter
extends Thread
implements LogEnabled

A demonstration runnable object that simply logs a countdown sequence.

Stephen McConnell
